database

Class SQLiteInterface

  • java.lang.Object
    • database.DatabaseInterface
      • database.SQLiteInterface

  • public class SQLiteInterface
extends DatabaseInterface
    Important class which queries the database for login, map, and statistics. Acts as interface between the database and rest of the program.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class database.DatabaseInterface

      • getTopTenPlayerStats

        public java.lang.String[][] getTopTenPlayerStats()
        Description copied from class: DatabaseInterface
        Retrieves the Top ten players by wins. Outputs as a 2d array of strings. Returned string must be 2*10. 1st column is the username, 2nd column is the number of wins. Each Row is a separate player.
        Specified by:
        getTopTenPlayerStats in class DatabaseInterface
        Returns:
        the top ten players (by games won) in the database

      • getHead2Head

        public int[] getHead2Head(User user1,
                 User user2)
        Description copied from class: DatabaseInterface
        Retrieves comparative wins between two users. returned value will be an array of ints of length 2. val[0] = Player One's Win count against Player Two. val[1] = Player Two's Win count against Player One.
        Specified by:
        getHead2Head in class DatabaseInterface
        Parameters:
        user1 -
        user2 -
        Returns:
        the head-to-head statistics between two users
